title.narrative: Youth Caravan: involving youth in agribusiness

description.narrative:
The Youth caravan: This will be a 6-day agribusiness learning caravan from one point to another, starting from Kampala, through the region and back to the national level as a climax, launching the agribusiness campaign (Feeding the world, changing lives). This caravan will draw participants from all region sfo the country. Other successful value actors from different areas will be sharing their own experiences through question and answer approach. The caravan will involve the media houses as the ear and eyes of the public to appreciate the youth in the development. The caravan will then climax into a national high level policy convention for effective engagement with policy makers. Below therefore is a series of activities that take place at each stage or on each day.
null
Agriterra will contribute to the Youth Caravan, organised by AgriProFocus in Uganda, August 2017. Goal:
To build a vibrant youth led agribusiness movement that creates employment, improves income and livelihoods, and promotes inclusive growth for sustainable socio-economic and democratic transformation of Uganda.
To inspire youth into joining expanded employment opportunities in the Agribusiness value chain. To provide a platform for registration, sharing information, knowledge and learning from real life experiences successful youth agripreneurs. To build a platform for collective youth action and opportunity for youth voices accessing policy makers with specific issues in the agribusiness sector. At least 70% Youth linked to agribusiness market opportunities, incubation and mentorship support services, Agri-skills development programs and market opportunities Policy makers give audience and respond to issues affecting youth through commitments At least 30% registered on the on-line platform Expected Outcomes
At least 90% of the 40 youth participants have an improved mindset and perception towards agribusiness At least 70% Youth linked to agribusiness market opportunities, incubation and mentorship support services, Agri-skills development programs and market opportunities Policy makers give audience and respond to issues affecting youth through commitments At least 30% registered on the on-line platform
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
Advise days. The value is summarized by year
Lobby and advocacy / Joint advocacy of family farmers with relevant stakeholders
